body:
Price +2,250 gp

Aura moderate conjuration

CL 7th

Weight &mdash

A suit of armor or shield with this special ability grants the wearer a +3 resistance bonus on saving throws against poison.
name: Poison-Resistant
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Armor Special Abilities/Magic Armor and Shield Special Ability Descriptions/Poison-Resistant

descriptor
